title: The soules harmony. Written by Nicholas Breton
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: By S. Stafford, for Randoll Bearkes: and are to be sold at the signe of the white Vnicorne in Popes-head Alley,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, followed by a reproduction of a photostat of A7-C4 of the same.
Photostat filmed as the leftmost of three editions.
